hero.title: Experience Authentic Italian at PizzaExpress Koramangala
hero.subtitle: Savor gourmet hand-tossed pizzas, mouth-melting cheesecake, and fresh Italian coffee, served with passion since 1965.

about.title: Our Story at PizzaExpress
about.paragraph1: Welcome to PizzaExpress Koramangala, your favorite pizzeria and cafe. We pride ourselves on serving authentic hand-tossed gourmet pizzas, alongside our mouth-melting in-house baked cheesecake and freshly brewed Italian coffee. We've been serving in style since 1965, bringing generations of culinary excellence to your table.
about.paragraph2: At PizzaExpress, every dish is crafted with the finest ingredients and a deep love for Italian traditions. Whether you're joining us for a casual lunch, a romantic dinner, or simply a coffee break, we promise an unforgettable dining experience that delights all your senses. Come and taste the legacy of flavor!
